statements: SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT id, gateway_name FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_type = 'Credit Card';
SELECT gateway_name, api_key FROM payment_gateways WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, gateway_type, secret_key FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_name LIKE '%PayPal%';
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_type FROM payment_gateways WHERE id > 0 ORDER BY gateway_name ASC
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT gateway_name, api_key FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_type = 'Credit Card'
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_type = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, gateway_type FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_name LIKE 'Pay%'
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_type FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT gateway_name, integration_key FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_id = 1;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_type FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_type = 'Online';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways JOIN payments ON payment_gateways.gateway_id = payments.gateway_id;
SELECT gateway_name, payment_date FROM payment_gateways JOIN payments ON payment_gateways.gateway_id = payments.gateway_id WHERE gateway_name LIKE 'Pay%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'success';
SELECT customer_id, payment_status FROM payments ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT payment_id, payment_status FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'pending';
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE full_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payment_transactions JOIN payments ON payment_transactions.transaction_id = payments.transaction_id WHERE amount < 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_gateway FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY payment_gateway, transaction_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_url FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT amount, currency, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'success' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_url FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;

SELECT payment_transactions.transaction_id, payment_transactions.amount, payment_transactions.status, payment_gateways.gateway_name FROM payment_transactions INNER JOIN payment_gateways ON payment_transactions.gateway_id = payment_gateways.gateway_id WHERE payment_transactions.status = 'success';

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.amount, orders.order_date FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.amount > 1000 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT currency FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT * FROM payments LIMIT 5;
SELECT payment_id, amount, currency FROM payments ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT method_name, method_type FROM payment_methods WHERE method_type = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT method_name, method_type FROM payment_methods ORDER BY method_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT log_message, log_date FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND log_date <= '2022-03-31';
